 2003-16712003-10-28INDUSTRY,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Tourism Commission Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Industry of ALEXANDER REFORD of St-Octave, Quebec, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
